name: Extreme Boat Racing
description:
This game is all about driving racing boat.  Extreme Boat Racing The most exotic boat racing game .

Who will win this competition?   Come and experience it.




Game Features

  • Amazing 3D graphics
  • 6 boat ?
  • Realistic driving physics
  • Amazing 3D graphics
  • Personal stats and records table
  • Spectator mode is fun 
  • AI system 
  • Android system
